nodes.text: Thall Joben was a famous swoop racer whose signature was engraved in the limited edition Joben T-85 speeder bike, a speeder bike model named after Joben, manufactured by Zebulon Dak Speeder Corporation, and available by 19 BBY.

Thall Joben was mentioned in the new Star Wars canon in the 2018 reference book Star Wars Encyclopedia of Starfighters and Other Vehicles, written by Landry Q. Walker. Thall Joben was originally introduced in the Star Wars Legends continuity in the first episode of the television show Star Wars: Droids: The Adventures of R2-D2 and C-3PO, which aired on September 7, 1985.
